LineFollowController - Class in nxt
 
LineFollowController(ColorSensor, LightSensor) - Constructor for class nxt.LineFollowController
Constructor of LineFollowController(LFC), sets the attributes lightSensor and colorSensor, makes LFC Listener of colorSensor and lightSensor, sets the travelspeed and starts run()
